description: Delta(3,5)-Delta(2,4)-dienoyl-CoA isomerase, mitochondrial (ECH1) is a member of the enoyl-CoA hydratase/isomerase family. ECH1 is involved in the isomerization of 3-trans,5-cis-dienoyl-CoA to 2-trans,4-trans-dienoyl-CoA as part of the fatty acid beta-oxidation and lipid metabolism pathways.
name: Anti-ECH1 Antibody
